00009 /* This protocol is implemented on the nRF2401 chip.  */
00010 #include "nrf2401.h"
00011 
00012 /* Wireless devices are nRF modules at present.  */
00013 typedef nrf_t rf_t;
00014 typedef nrf_obj_t rf_obj_t;
00015 typedef nrf_cfg_t rf_cfg_t;

00018 /* Macros to attempt to reduce interdependence between this wireless code and
00019    the RF module it is implemented on.  The rf_setup() function still needs to
00020    be individually set up for the RF device being used.  */
00021 #define RF_RX_MODE_SET(DEV) nrf_rf_dir_set (DEV, NRF_RX_MODE)
00022 
00023 #define RF_TX_MODE_SET(DEV) nrf_rf_dir_set (DEV, NRF_TX_MODE)
00024
